author: BBC News
title: Afghanistan: Girls' education activist arrested by Taliban
description: Matiullah Wesa has long travelled to remote parts trying to improve access to education for all children.
content:
A prominent Afghan campaigner for female education has been arrested by the Taliban, even as teenage girls and women remain barred from classrooms.
